meanings.sent1: She is unwrinkling the shirt before wearing it.
meanings.sent2: I always unwrinkle my clothes before going out.
meanings.sent3: He unwrinkled the paper with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unwrinkled the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The iron did a great job unwrinkling the fabric.

meanings.definition: Make something smooth by removing wrinkles
meanings.sent1: The tailor is unwrinkling the dress for the customer.
meanings.sent2: Please unwrinkle the tablecloth before setting the table.
meanings.sent3: The magician unwrinkled the scarf as part of his trick.
meanings.sent4: Her apology unwrinkled the frown on his face.
meanings.sent5: The warm iron is perfect for unwrinkling clothes quickly.
